name: places/ChIJyTjXB_fzwokRyPrs0sdwumE
adrFormatAddress: 4915 Broadway, New York, NY 10034-3119, USA

originalText.text: I wanted to like this place, but it was more of a hassle than it was helpful. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend going for tailoring unless you have to. Initially, the customer service was friendly and helpful. I got a number of pants tailored, but they made three mistakes on them. First, it was hard to get them to admit they made the mistakes in the first place, but eventually they admitted it after I kept pointing it out and they measured some things. They told me they were going to fix the mistakes  and add tapering to one pair of pants ‚Äúon the house‚Äù. But then, ‚Äúsurprise‚Äù‚Ä¶ when I went to pick up the pants, they charged me $20 for the taper and said I was the one confused about the situation. They said the fixes ‚Äúon the house‚Äù were for the mistakes THEY made in the first place. Why would that be ‚Äúon the house‚Äù when it is something I already paid for, and THEY made the mistakes? For example, one of the mistakes was one hemmed pant leg was clearly longer than the other. How is fixing their error ‚Äúon the house‚Äù? Don‚Äôt go. At best, they are ‚Äúnice people‚Äù initially, but if your experience is like mine they will do a poor rushed job, then you will have to fight for them to admit and fix the things, then they will confuse you with their prices and say ‚Äúyou‚Äù are the one who is mistaken. Not worth it. An initial hopeful experience turned sour by poor quality, running from responsibility, communicating in a misleading way, and then overcharging me.

Not worth it. An initial hopeful experience turned sour by poor quality, running from responsibility, communicating in a misleading way, and then overcharging me.

originalText.text: I went to pick up my clothes a few hours earlier this am before planned work day and was spoken down to. I was told to pay full price for everything yet was never given back red dress i dropped off. I was told there are cameras and dont worry. I recorded conversation. I am going back for my red dress tonight and after getting back dry cleaning with stains, i wont be using this place ever again. Any damage to my dress because my other clothes were stained, i am going to better business bureau.

originalText.text: Coming here for years. Everyone is pleasant and they held my clothes for months which totally forgot about and when I remembered thought it would have been sold but wasn‚Äôt! Phew!!

text.text: Coming here for years. Everyone is pleasant and they held my clothes for months which totally forgot about and when I remembered thought it would have been sold but wasn‚Äôt! Phew!!

originalText.text:
I needed an item that had a stain on it, normally they would need more time to get it out, but I needed it the next day.
They were very accommodating and did it for me anyway, just reminding me to please try to bring items with spots with more time for them to work on it.
I was very happy with the service and how my shirt came out.üòÅ

originalText.text: I had a very positive, first time experience here. Went to have my bridesmaid dress hemmed. Richie had me try on the dress and pinned it where I needed it. It was ready in 4 days and it looked amazing! The stitching was lovely. The price was relatively cheap too. Will be returning in the future!
